question_stem.en: A 21-year-old woman at 18 weeks gestation comes to the office for a routine prenatal visit. A quadruple screen reveals an elevated maternal serum alpha-fetoprotein. Sonographic imaging of the fetus shows an anterior abdominal wall defect with herniation of bowel contents adjacent to the umbilicus. No covering membrane is identified. Color Doppler ultrasound imaging shows a normal 3-vessel cord inserting medial to this defect. The remainder of the anatomical survey is unremarkable. Which of the following is the most likely cause of these fetal findings?
question_stem.zh: 一名孕龄18周的21岁女性前来就诊进行常规产前检查。四联筛查显示母亲血清甲胎蛋白升高。胎儿超声成像显示前腹壁缺损，伴有肠内容物突出，邻近脐部。未发现覆盖膜。彩色多普勒超声成像显示正常的3血管脐带插入此缺损内侧。其余解剖学检查无异常。以下哪项最可能是这些胎儿发现的原因？

question.en: Which of the following is the most likely cause of these fetal findings?
question.zh: 以下哪项最可能是这些胎儿发现的原因？

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of fetal abdominal wall defects, specifically gastroschisis and omphalocele, and their distinguishing features on prenatal ultrasound and maternal serum alpha-fetoprotein levels. It also tests the ability to differentiate these conditions from other causes of abdominal wall defects or gastrointestinal issues.

To solve this question, focus on the key findings: anterior abdominal wall defect, herniation of bowel contents adjacent to the umbilicus, absence of a covering membrane, and elevated maternal serum alpha-fetoprotein. These findings are most consistent with gastroschisis.
summary.zh:
这个问题考察了对胎儿腹壁缺损（特别是腹裂和脐膨出）的了解，以及它们在产前超声和母亲血清甲胎蛋白水平上的鉴别特征。它还考察了将这些疾病与其他腹壁缺损或胃肠道问题的病因区分开来的能力。

要解决这个问题，请关注关键发现：前腹壁缺损、肠内容物突出邻近脐部、无覆盖膜以及母亲血清甲胎蛋白升高。这些发现与腹裂最为一致。

tags: Gastroschisis; Omphalocele; Fetal abdominal wall defects; Prenatal ultrasound; Alpha-fetoprotein; Congenital anomalies; Obstetrics; Maternal-fetal medicine
